numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graph shows the percentages of players with color and coaches with color in some sports.
2. The sports associations are based in the United States.
3. In most sports, most players are people of color.
4. In most sports, most coaches are white.
5. In basketball, athletes of color are well represented compared to other sports.
6. In all sports, the percentage of coaches of color is lower than the percentage of players of color.
7. We wonder why head coaches are less likely to be people of color.
8. In soccer, the percentage of coaches of color is high compared to other sports.
9. We wonder why soccer has a high percentage of coaches of color.
10. Soccer is widely played in other parts of the world.
11. If soccer is widely played in other parts of the world then soccer has a wider variety of coaches.
12. This data may discourage coaches of color from pursuing coaching positions on diverse teams.
13. This data may influence minorities to join sports.
14. This data may influence people of color to join sports.
15. In these sports, everybody is included.
16. A person can become a professional player of any sport regardless of skin color.
17. The headline is: The divide in diversity: the gap between diverse athletes and coaches.
